definition: to impersonate/to act the part of sb/to disguise oneself as sb else
to disguise oneself as/to dress up/to play (a role)/to put on (an expression)

sentences.english: QiLe know QiRen looking for Fanny after pretending to be a mother, angry.
sentences.chinese: 祁樂知道祁仁找芬妮假扮母親後，怒氣沖天。

sentences.english: I could not stand any longer to pretend to be another person.
sentences.chinese: 我再也不能忍受假扮成另一個人的生活。

sentences.english: Little Chang Bao disguised herself as a boy.
sentences.chinese: 小常寶把自己假扮成男孩。

sentences.english: Keyboard and others pretend to be lion came to congratulate.
sentences.chinese: 李劍等人假扮成舞獅隊前來祝賀。

sentences.english: The spy was caught by a policewoman who posed as a passerby.
sentences.chinese: 間諜被一個假扮路人的女警察抓住了。

sentences.english: As a fine Pu chicken meet cable dolong, that he duolong bow.
sentences.chinese: 假扮溥一的細雞遇見索多隆，多隆即跪拜他。

sentences.english: She pretends as a princess and gets into a psychological war with SSH over a note (money).
sentences.chinese: 她假扮公主，爲了一張紙幣與宋承憲展開心理戰。

sentences.english: The prince, disguised as a swineherd, went to the princess' palace.
sentences.chinese: 假扮成豬倌的王子去了公主的宮殿。

sentences.english: A troop of yuan-ti purebloods posing a human mercenaries move into an area.
sentences.chinese: 一羣純血統的蛇人假扮人類僱傭軍進入一個區域。

sentences.english: Take apple heart think with blue xing disguised as husband and wife, can be close to the objects.
sentences.chinese: 花蘋一心以爲與邢藍假扮夫妻，便可親近心儀對象。

sentences.english: You primp as brothel woman by the body of place son, is exactly your biggest flaw in prose.
sentences.chinese: 你以處子之身假扮青樓女子，正是你最大的敗筆。

sentences.english: Another individual from the same town as the imposter pretended to be Cleverley's bodyguard.
sentences.chinese: 同一城鎮的另外一人假扮是克萊維利的保鏢。

definition: to dress up in disguise (idiom); to pretend for the purpose of deceit
to feign/to pretend to be/to pass oneself off as
(of actors) to make up/to disguise oneself
(of a man) to dress as a woman (idiom)
to fool people (idiom)/to pull the wool over people's eyes
to hide (as an undercover agent)/an insider (in a gang of thieves)/a mole
